verses.verse: Then a <S%H2415>shoot<s%> will <S%H3318>spring<s%> from the <S%H1503>stem<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> And a <S%H5342>branch<s%> from his <S%H8328>roots<s%> will <S%H6509>bear<s%> <S%H6509>fruit.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5117>rest<s%> on Him, The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel<s%> and <S%H1369>strength,<s%> The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And He will <S%H9552>delight<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And He will not <S%H8199>judge<s%> by <S%H4758>what<s%> His <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H4758>see,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H3198>make<s%> a <S%H3198>decision<s%> by <S%H4926>what<s%> His <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H4926>hear;<s%>

But with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> And <S%H3198>decide<s%> with <S%H4334>fairness<s%> for the <S%H6035>afflicted<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> And He will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of His <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> And with the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of His <S%H8193>lips<s%> He will <S%H4191>slay<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
Also <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> will be the <S%H232>belt<s%> about His <S%H2504>loins,<s%> And <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> the <S%H232>belt<s%> about His <S%H2504>waist.<s%>

And the <S%H2061>wolf<s%> will <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with the <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> And the <S%H5246>leopard<s%> will <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> with the <S%H1423>kid,<s%> And the <S%H5695>calf<s%> and the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> and the <S%H4806>fatling<s%> <S%H9191>together;<s%> And a <S%H9512>little<s%> <S%H5288>boy<s%> will <S%H5090>lead<s%> them.

Also the <S%H6510>cow<s%> and the <S%H1677>bear<s%> will <S%H7462>graze;<s%> Their <S%H3206>young<s%> will <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> <S%H9191>together;<s%> And the <S%H9030>lion<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H8401>straw<s%> like the <S%H1241>ox.<s%>

And the <S%H3243>nursing<s%> child will <S%H8173>play<s%> by the <S%H2352>hole<s%> of the <S%H6620>cobra,<s%> And the <S%H1580>weaned<s%> child will <S%H1911>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the viper's <S%H3975>den.<s%>

They will not <S%H7489>hurt<s%> or <S%H7843>destroy<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> For the <S%H776>earth<s%> will be <S%H4390>full<s%> of the <S%H1844>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> As the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Then it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day<s%> That the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H1875>resort<s%> to the <S%H8328>root<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> will <S%H5975>stand<s%> as a <S%H5251>signal<s%> for the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> And His <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place<s%> will be <S%H9202>glorious.<s%>

Then it will <S%H1961>happen<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H136>Lord<s%> Will <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H7069>recover<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8145>time<s%> with His <S%H3027>hand<s%> The <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of His <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will <S%H7604>remain,<s%> From <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H6624>Pathros,<s%> <S%H3568>Cush,<s%> <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> <S%H8152>Shinar,<s%> <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> And from the <S%H339>islands<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

And He will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up a <S%H5251>standard<s%> for the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And will <S%H622>assemble<s%> the <S%H5080>banished<s%> ones of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> And will <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H9339>dispersed<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> From the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>corners<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Then the <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will <S%H5493>depart,<s%> And those who <S%H6887>harass<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off;<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will not be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will not <S%H6887>harass<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

And they will <S%H5774>swoop<s%> <S%H5774>down<s%> on the <S%H3802>slopes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> on the <S%H3220>west;<s%> <S%H9191>Together<s%> they will <S%H962>plunder<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6924>east;<s%> They will <S%H4916>possess<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H9000>Edom<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> will be <S%H4928>subject<s%> to them.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H3220>Sea<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> And He will <S%H5130>wave<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5104>River<s%> With His <S%H5868>scorching<s%> <S%H7307>wind;<s%> And He will <S%H5221>strike<s%> it into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5158>streams,<s%> And make [men] <S%H1869>walk<s%> over dry-shod.

And there will be a <S%H4546>highway<s%> from <S%H804>Assyria<s%> For the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of His <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will be <S%H7604>left,<s%> <S%H9201>Just<s%> as there was for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that they <S%H5927>came<s%> up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
